text: @GOP @realDonaldTrump Let’s see 1/3 of all kids in Florida have COVID-19 and school hasn’t even started.  No money or plans to keep kids safe but yeah, let’s go ahead and open because lying Republicans say everything is great.  Clearly, getting sick and possibly dying is better than studying at home.
